title: Google launches a new Works with Chromebook badge for accessories
description: Google launches a new Works with Chromebook badge for accessories  which certifies that chargers  mice  keyboards  power adapters  and more will be compatible with Chromebooks  There are currently   companies that offer accessories as part of the program
content: Chargers  mice  keyboards  power adapters  and more Image  Google Google has launched a new Works with Chromebook badge for accessories that are certified to be compatible with Chromebooks  via  to Google  The certification will be given to chargers  mice     chars
